title: Hard Letters and Folded Wings
description: In Hard Letters and Folded Wings, the author writes about themes common to women's lives. Many of the poems in this collection have been used by therapists in Florida and New York as a resource for their clients. Four of the poems have been finalists for the Emily Dickinson Award, The Frank Oâ€™Hara Award, the Richard Eberhart Poetry Award, and the Michael Egan Annual Poetry Contest.
author: Martha Brenckle
